doc.field: David N. Judelson papers on Gulf and Western Industries
David N. Judelson papers on Gulf and Western Industries
Gulf + Western business plans, financial data, etc.
Gulf + Western business plans, financial data, etc.

This box holds a variety of materials, primarily from the early 1980s. These include, among others, a history of G+W acquisitions from 1957-1980; transcripts of interviews with staff from U.S. Representative Emanuel Celler's Antitrust Subcommittee during its investigation of conglomerate corporations (1969); cash forecasts (1980-83); flash (financial) reports (1982-83); file regarding the sale of Consolidated Cigar (1982); business plan (1982); and various brochures and other documents concerning electric vehicles/energy storage systems (ESS).
